title: Hans Dampf (2013)
storyline: 'Nobody can tell you exactly about the meaning of life, but one thing is for sure: It's not being the richest guy on the cemetery.' (Peter Ustinov) HANS DAMPF is a musical Roadmovie Fairytale about wanting and having: We accompany our hero on his quest for luck and love down south and lucky he gets. Bartering his VW-Bus for a Three wheeler, that one for a nice rubber boat and the boat for a bike. He's all out of money when he meets Fee and it looks like they could live happily ever after.
